FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike.” —Klattic, Boros legionnaire

„Ihre vornehmen Augen sind viel schlimmer als ihre fehlenden Umrisse. Ich traue mich gar nicht, sie anzugreifen.” —Klattic, Boros-Legionär
« Leur regard noble est encore plus horrible à contempler que leur forme éthérée. Je n’ose pas les frapper. » —Klattic, légionnaire boros
“Más espantoso que sus formas vacías son sus nobles ojos. No me atrevo a golpear.” —Klattic, legionario boros
やつらのうつろな姿より怖かったのが、やつらの堂々とした視線さ。 殴りかかれなかったよ。 ――ボロスの軍団兵、クラティク
“More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike.” —Klattic, Boros legionnaire

“Mais terrível que suas formas vazias, são seus nobres olhos. Não me atrevo a atacá-los.” —Klattic, legionário Boros

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.
Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno da combattimento alle Anime dei Senzacolpa, guadagni altrettanti punti vita e il giocatore attaccante perde altrettanti punti vita.
Immer wenn den Seelen der Untadeligen Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhältst du ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazu und der angreifende Spieler verliert entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte.
À chaque fois que les Âmes des vertueux subissent des blessures de combat, vous gagnez autant de points de vie et le joueur attaquant perd autant de points de vie.
Siempre que las Almas de los inocentes reciban daño de combate, ganas esa cantidad de vida y el jugador atacante pierde esa cantidad de vida.
完全無欠の魂に戦闘ダメージが与えられるたび、あなたはその点数に等しいライフを得て、攻撃プレイヤーはその点数に等しいライフを失う。
Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.
Каждый раз, когда Душам безвинных наносят боевые повреждения, вы получаете столько же жизни, а нападающий игрок теряет столько же жизни, сколько нанесено повреждений.
Toda vez que Almas dos Inocentes sofre dano de combate, você ganha aquela quantidade em pontos de vida e o jogador atacante perde aquela quantidade em pontos de vida.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local damage_amount = Damage():GetAmount() local player = EffectController() local attack_player = TriggerObject():GetPlayer() if Object():IsAttacking() ~= 0 then -- this would mean that Souls of the Faultless somehow lost defender and I'm the attacking player. attack_player = player end if (player ~= nil) then player:GainLife( damage_amount ) end if (attack_player ~= nil) then attack_player:LoseLife( damage_amount ) end
